_header: We wone in this world as wedded for to wither
_description: On the uncertainty of life — four monorhyming lines

BLHar485.Transcription:
We wone in þis world as wedded for…All sall we
                    heghen…ne wote whiderWich nogh come we hyder wich noght
                    sa…Thus sall ye gamme go of þat we draw to gider
